    • init

      public void init() throws MalformedURLException, NotBoundException, RemoteException, ServerNotActiveException
      This method is used to ask the user to insert the server's IP address
      抛出:
      RemoteException - when the connection to the server is failed
      NotBoundException - when the connection to the server is failed
      MalformedURLException - when the connection to the server is failed
      ServerNotActiveException - when the connection to the server is failed

      public boolean showHand()

      返回:

      public void checkTurn()
      This method is used to check if it's the user's turn If it's not, it will wait until it's his turn

    • askInfo

      public String askInfo(String type, String defaultValue)
      This method is used to ask the communication info
      参数:
      type - the type of info to ask "IP" or "PORT" "IP" is the IP address of the server "PORT" is the port of the server

      If the user press enter, the default value will be used If the user insert an invalid value, he will be asked again

      defaultValue - the default value to use If the user press enter, this value will be used If the user insert an invalid value, he will be asked again
      返回:
      the value inserted by the user

    • askTheIndex

      public int askTheIndex(String type, int lower_limit, int upper_limit)
      Ask a single index Used for:askCoordinates() or askIndex() or askColumn()
      参数:
      type - "ROW" or "COLUMN" or "Position1" or "Position2"
      lower_limit - the minimum value of index
      upper_limit - the maximum value of index
      返回:
      Index(ROW, COLUMN, Position according to type)

    • refreshChat

      public void refreshChat()
      This method refresh the TUI only when chatMode is true

    • updateCLI

      public void updateCLI(int milliseconds)
      This method is used to update the CLI
      参数:
      milliseconds - the milliseconds to wait

    • readLine

      public String readLine()
      Read a line from the standard input
      返回:
      the string read from the input

    • setChatMode

      public void setChatMode(Boolean value)
      This method is used to set the chat mode If the chat mode is true, the CLI will not be refreshed
      参数:
      value - the value to set
